mainSequence.step: Admin starts the creation of a new user
EletricGo requests data (first name, last name, email, password, password confirmation, phone number, user type) from Admin
Admin enters data (first name, last name, email, password, password confirmation, phone number, user type) into EletricGo
EletricGo shows data and asks for confirmation from Admin
EletricGo informs the success of the operation to Admin
